page.title: 10Church, Ashford Carbonell
page.content: The name of Ashford Carbonell church is St. Mary Magdalene.The bell tower is made of wood and set on the west side of the church.Ashford Carbonell church is very old because it was here in Norman times, and since then it has been repaired and altered .The church is made of stone and wood, but when it was first built we think it was made of only wood.At the back of the church there is a stained glass window shaped like an eye, as though it is God's eye and He sees through it.The stone around the windows and arch is shaped in a way so that it is smooth and flat.The rest of the church is also made of stone but that does not look as smooth.At the back of the church is an iron grave which is covered in rust and all overgrown. Everyone thinks it is a witch's grave.
